description:
Subnet Cipher Professional is a network calculator tool designed specifically for the TouchPad. 

Just learning Subnetting?  This is a great learning aid, helps visualize whats really happening at the bit layer.

*** New in version 1.5.0: Added Wildcard Mask result, added XML file format for export.


Subnet Cipher Professional builds upon the free version, adding the following features and enhancements;

- Automatic Wi-Fi IP Address detection auto-updates (results change in real-time as you roam to another Wi-Fi network)
- Result Filters show the results in Binary, Hexadecimal, and/or Dotted Decimal, persistent to all output files or methods
- Slide-out side panel automatically “bookmarks” the 10 most recent Ciphers for push button re-entry
- User friendly design, easy data entry and convenient copy of results data from all fields
- Print your results, WYSIWYG using the familiar webOS print control dialog
- Save the results to a file in Text, XML, or JSON format, save data reflects filter settings automatically
- eMail the results using HTML formatted text, or eMail the results as an attachment (text, XML, or JSON)

Please let me know if I've missed anything or if you need a specific feature added, and most of all, please enjoy...  

Brought to you by Youngdahl US
versionNote: Added Wildcard Mask result, added XML file format for export, mild reformatting of results, bug fix on link to review
